video.title: The Time In Between
video.synopsis: With Spain on the brink of civil war, a Madrid dressmaker follows a lover to Morocco, loses a fortune, and ends up a spy for the Allies.

episodes.synopsis: Sira is a young dressmaker dating a nice guy, until she meets the dashing Ramiro, who convinces her to leave everything behind and move to Africa.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Ramiro and Sira arrive in Tangier and discover an exotic world of luxury. Ramiro is always drunk and taking Sira’s money, and the two get in a fight.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Commander Vázquez takes Sira to stay with Candelaria, an eccentric woman who’s had problems with the law. Sira won’t eat and stays in bed all day.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Candelaria proposes Sira create an exclusive shop in a luxury building in Tétouan. No one shows up at first, until a German woman orders some dresses.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Rosalinda needs a dress for tonight. Sira and Jamila work together to make a last-minute miracle. Sira finds out Rosalinda is with Lt. Col. Beigbeder.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Rosalinda gets a reporter, Marcus Logan, to help her mother escape in exchange for an interview with Beigbeder. Marcus invites Sira to an elite event.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Sira is developing an attraction towards Marcus. Rosalinda appears to be very ill, and when Sira visits she says it’s because her husband has arrived.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Sira and Marcus decide to steal the debt documents of the husband of one of the shop’s customers. Then he’ll flee Tétouan and say goodbye to Sira.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Sira meets Alan Hilgarth, coordinator for the Madrid Secret Service, who offers her a new identity as Aris Agoriuq, an elite Moroccan model.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Beigbeder tells Sira he’s been relieved of his duties for advising Franco not to ally with the Germans. He asks her to give Rosalinda some letters.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Sira decides to help Paquita, but it won’t be easy. With all of the problems from her former life sorted out, she’s ready for a life of intrigue.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Da Silva plans to travel to Madrid for an exclusive dinner party. Sira has to get herself an invitation, corner Manuel and get him to talk.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Manuel Da Silva wants to see Sira before he leaves for Madrid, and invites her to visit his factories in Portugal. Sira runs into Marcus Logan.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Sira finds out from Beatriz, Da Silva’s secretary, a Spanish woman who had to flee to Portugal, that Manuel has dealings with the Germans.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Sira and Rosalinda come up with a plan to let Marcus know he’s in danger. Sira tells Rosalinda about the microfilm and the Da Silva dinner party.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: As Sira writes down the information she’s gathered, Rosalinda stops by the hotel with startling news. Meanwhile, Manuel grows suspicious.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Sira visits Hilgarth to tell him about the tungsten mines, but he already knows, which has Sira suspecting that Marcus might not really be a reporter.
episodes.title: Episode 17
